title: Engineering maths-2
content: I am finding the first chapter of maths very difficult and not being able to understand anything in class.   Will the chapters of eng maths 2 keep getting harder as the first unit itself seems a daunting task to me

comments.body:
>Will the chapters of eng maths 2 keep getting harder

Yes

Bro you're paying 5L, go to the teachers room and pester them until you understand the topic.
Hi could you DM me the same?

This might seem like a useless tip, but trust me it helped me out an awful lot. LEARN CONCEPTS FROM YOUR TEXTBOOK AND YOUTUBE!  Practice all the questions solved in class (pretty sure you can find it on the PESU media discord server). Slides made by professors for all maths subjects are horrendous.
>Can u DM me the same Struggling with  math's.
Can you please post it here please ? Or DM those tips to me too ? Thanks so much
